name: inforger
description: Nostalgic Fever is a web platform that allows users to create and store digital time capsules containing text, images, and videos. With features like public and private capsules, chat functionality, gamification through a leaderboard, sentiment analysis, and blockchain security, Nostalgic Fever provides a unique way to preserve and relive memories.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
